Class CommunityService

java.lang.Object
br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.services.CommunityService
public class CommunityService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing community-related operations. This class handles the creation, modification, and deletion of communities, as well as user membership and message management within communities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructor that initializes the CommunityService with required repositories.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommunityService

      public CommunityService(UserRepository userRepository, CommunityRepository communityRepository)
      Constructor that initializes the CommunityService with required repositories. Loads community data upon initialization.
      Parameters:
      userRepository - The repository for user data
      communityRepository - The repository for community data

  • Method Details

    • createCommunity

      public void createCommunity(String sessao, String nome, String descricao) throws InvalidCommunityException, NotFoundUserException
      Creates a new community with the specified name and description. The user identified by the session becomes the community manager.
      Parameters:
      sessao - The session ID of the user creating the community
      nome - The name of the community to be created
      descricao - The description of the community
      Throws:
      InvalidCommunityException - If a community with the same name already exists
      NotFoundUserException - If the user session is invalid

    • getCommunities

      public List<String> getCommunities()
      Retrieves a list of all community names in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of community names

    • getCommunityByUser

      public String getCommunityByUser(String nome) throws NotFoundUserException
      Retrieves a formatted string of communities associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      nome - The login of the user
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the communities the user belongs to
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found

    • getCommunity

      public Community getCommunity(String nome) throws InvalidCommunityException
      Retrieves a community by its name.
      Parameters:
      nome - The name of the community to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Community object
      Throws:
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist

    • getCommunityDescription

      public String getCommunityDescription(String nome) throws InvalidCommunityException
      Retrieves the description of a community.
      Parameters:
      nome - The name of the community
      Returns:
      The description of the community
      Throws:
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist

    • getCommunityOwner

      public String getCommunityOwner(String owner) throws InvalidCommunityException
      Retrieves the manager (owner) of a community.
      Parameters:
      owner - The name of the community
      Returns:
      The login of the community manager
      Throws:
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist

    • getCommunityMembers

      public String getCommunityMembers(String nome) throws InvalidCommunityException
      Retrieves a formatted string of members in a community.
      Parameters:
      nome - The name of the community
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the members of the community
      Throws:
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist

    • listCommunities

      public String listCommunities(String login) throws NotFoundUserException
      Lists the communities a user has joined.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the user
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the communities the user has joined
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found

    • joinCommunity

      public void joinCommunity(String id, String nome) throws NotFoundUserException, InvalidCommunityException
      Adds a user to a community.
      Parameters:
      id - The session ID of the user
      nome - The name of the community to join
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist or the user is already a member

    • leaveCommunity

      public void leaveCommunity(String id, String nome) throws NotFoundUserException, InvalidCommunityException
      Removes a user from a community.
      Parameters:
      id - The session ID of the user
      nome - The name of the community to leave
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist, the user is not a member, or the user is the manager

    • editCommunityDescription

      public void editCommunityDescription(String id, String nome, String descricao) throws NotFoundUserException, InvalidCommunityException
      Updates the description of a community. Only the community manager can perform this operation.
      Parameters:
      id - The session ID of the user
      nome - The name of the community
      descricao - The new description for the community
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist or the user is not the manager

    • transferManagement

      public void transferManagement(String id, String nome, String novoGerente) throws NotFoundUserException, InvalidCommunityException
      Transfers the management of a community to another user. Only the current manager can perform this operation.
      Parameters:
      id - The session ID of the current manager
      nome - The name of the community
      novoGerente - The login of the user who will become the new manager
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If either user is not found
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist, the current user is not the manager, or the new manager is not a member

    • deleteCommunity

      public void deleteCommunity(String id, String nome) throws NotFoundUserException, InvalidCommunityException
      Deletes a community. Only the community manager can perform this operation.
      Parameters:
      id - The session ID of the user
      nome - The name of the community to delete
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist or the user is not the manager

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(String sessionId, String communityName, String content)
      Sends a message to a community. The message will be visible to all community members.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user sending the message
      communityName - The name of the community
      content - The content of the message
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found
      InvalidCommunityException - If the community does not exist

    • readMessage

      public String readMessage(String sessionId)
      Reads messages from communities the user is a member of.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user
      Returns:
      The content of the next unread message
      Throws:
      NotFoundUserException - If the user is not found

    • loadData

      public void loadData()
      Loads community data from persistent storage.

    • saveData

      public void saveData()
      Saves community data to persistent storage.

    • clearAll

      public void clearAll()
      Clears all community data from memory.

    • deleteDataFile

      public boolean deleteDataFile()
      Deletes the community data file.
      Returns:
      true if the file was successfully deleted or did not exist, false otherwise
